reviewText:
I almost returned this CD before I watched the second half of it.
The first half, "Be Carefule what you wish for", is blatantly pointless.  Its a collection of animation that I guess is supposed to prove that they could make characters move, but didn't know how to write a decent story line.  Maybe its because of the age of these pieces.
The second half, "The Classic Collection", redeemed the CD somewhat.  "Mask of the Red Death" is notable in its style and story line (from the Poe story).  "Butterflies" looks like a modern Chagall caught the animation bug...
